lines.text: There it is. Looks like you've got some kind of alternate universe in there or something.
Don't call me sir! I ain't no politician!

[referring to a potential human sacrifice]
Is she really a virgin? Because I've never seen one before.
run around in our underwear, make funny phone calls.
Shut up Charlie! Can't you shut your mouth just once?
Jessie! It's me! I'm your great-great grandson. They named me after you. My name is Jessie too.

[Gramps slowly removes mask, Jessie and Charlie wimper]
My great-great grandson? What year is it?
I don't know.
Now don't you mess with me boy!
Uhh! October 30, 1986!
Well goddamn. I've been waitin' over 70 years for some jackass to get the scent to come dig me up. Thank you, boy.

[Crying]
Look at me. I'm a 170-year-old fart. I'm a goddamn zombie.

[laughs at Jessie]
I think she likes you.
Come on, Charlie.
No, really.
[Turns to Virgin]
Charlie, crazy, yet fun, huh, or him.
[Jessie throws a food at Charlie's face]
I rest my case.
[Virin throws something at Charlie]
OWWW!
Who's your friend? Bozo the Clown?
Bozo the Death Machine.

[Holds up the glowing skull]
Now it's mine!
Give me the skull!
